title: Fitbit integration will make or break the Pixel Watch
description: Google can't risk making just another uninteresting Wear OS watch.

title: Every serious hiker should have something like the Garmin InReach Mini 2
description: I can't imagine hiking without one anymore.

title: Google’s new Pixel ecosystem should look to Samsung for inspiration
description: Google could learn a thing or two from Samsung's ecosystem success.

title: Too many of you sleep with your phone, and it’s bad for your health
description: If you're not sleeping soundly, your phone may be the reason why.
